item.description:
This event is open to all members of the group. I am hosting an Arbonne party at my house. Arbonne is a great way to get some gifts bought for those people on your list that you never know what to get. Arbonne is a swiss skin care line (www.arbonne.com) that rocks. I will be selling gift bags stating at $15 and all products will be available for individual purchase. There are products for men, women, babies, and teens. Scents include Mandarin Cashmere, luxurious Almond, Ginger Citrus and many more.

For those of you who have attend previous open houses you know it is just a casual way to get together at someone's home and sample some fun stuff. There is no pressure to buy but instead a fun way to do some shopping and have some food and drink while meeting new people. Trust me it is very low-key and we always have a blast. I would love to have all of you attend so we can have a great open house event.

For those of you who can't make Friday night please see the website as I have scheduled another open house on 10/29/06. I would love to finally meet you all. Also anyone who brings a friend will be entered into a drawing for a free prize.

You MUST RSVP on this site and you must send me a personal email at kristie.goodgion@genzyme.com if you will be attending. Once again this is only to ensure attendance so that I can plan food and drinks. I really hope to see you all there and get in the Holiday spirit early this year.

FYI.....these events usually last about 2 hours but I am very happy to have people stay and hang out after....as some of you already know!!!!

Kristie
item.name: Happy Holiday Open House
